title: Hue Changer?
body:
https://imgur.com/a/QcOLy70

https://imgur.com/a/vt1390S

I don't know if this is an utterly stupid idea or a genius one, but I think it would be so cool if we could purchase a hue changer for individual champs. 

I get chromas exist and stuff, but I feel like if Riot is so busy doing other things and don't have time to give every single champion and skin a chroma, I think it would be cool if we could get an Item from the shop the changes the hue of the champions splash and in game model, like shiny pokemon!
